pageProduct.name: Alkira Hydrating Cleansing Lotion 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Hyper Hydrators + Australian Natives + Natural AHA’s. PEG And SLS Free. Our moisture rich cleansing lotion breaks makeup down in microseconds and rinses off like a dream, leaving your skin looking fresh and feeling amazing.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Flavone Glycosides and Ferulic Acid - potent antioxidants to fight free radical damage and protect skin • Australian native complex of Lilly Pilly and Desert Lime, rich in vitamin C and AHA’s to reveal clear skin • Essential fatty acid rich Kangaroo Paw and phytonutrients to strengthen the skins barrier and lock in moisture. • Skin softening Sesame, Rosehip and Jojoba • Tone and balance with Horsetail and Nettle

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Equisetum Arvense (Horsetail) Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Arctium Lappa (Burdock) Root Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Syzygium Luehmannii (Lilly Pilly) Fruit Extract, Anigozanthos Flavidus (Kangaroo Paw) Flower/Leaf Extract, Vanillin, Tocopherol, Water (Aqua), Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene* Linalool* Geraniol * Allergens

Directions

Gently massage onto damp skin. Remove with cotton wool or warm face cloth. Use daily or often as required.
